product_name: Bed HeadHard Head Extreme Hold Hairspray
summary: SummaryHard Head is Bed Head's strongest hold hairspray with 5 out of 5 strength hold! This super firm hold hair spray fixes hairstyles in place for long-lasting hold and control. The hairspray dries instantly with a natural shine finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsExtra strong hold hair sprayGreat for styling all hair typesKey IngredientsFormulated with a Hard Core Fixative creating a strong hold for long-lasting hairstyles, Plasticizer that makes the spray set more rigidly for styles that stay put, and a Low Fixative Neutralizer for a incredible hold that doesn't budge.Scent TypeVibrarant Apple fragranceItem 2576175How To UseGreat for styling women's and men's hair! Hold the spray 10-12 inches from dry finished style, or spot spray as desired. Layer to increase firmness. Top Tip: This is our strongest hairspray and gets stronger if you need it to. Apply in layers for an even firmer hold.Pre-caution: Flammable until fully dry. Do not use near heat, flame or while smoking. Can cause serious injury or death. Avoid inhalation. Avoid spraying in eyes. Contents under pressure. Do not puncture or incinerate. Do not expose to heat or store at temperatures above 120째f/50째c or in enclosed places that could overheat. Do not use on broken skin. Stop use if rash or irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling the contents can be harmful or fatal.IngredientsAlcohol Denat., Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Fragrance (Parfum), AMP-Isostearoyl Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Triethyl Citrate, Pentaerythrityl Tetracaprylate/Tetracaprate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Water (Aqua/Eau), PEG/PPG-17/18 Dimethicone.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Great for styling women's and men's hair! Hold the spray 10-12 inches from dry finished style, or spot spray as desired. Layer to increase firmness. Top Tip: This is our strongest hairspray and gets stronger if you need it to. Apply in layers for an even firmer hold.Pre-caution: Flammable until fully dry. Do not use near heat, flame or while smoking. Can cause serious injury or death. Avoid inhalation. Avoid spraying in eyes. Contents under pressure. Do not puncture or incinerate. Do not expose to heat or store at temperatures above 120째f/50째c or in enclosed places that could overheat. Do not use on broken skin. Stop use if rash or irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling the contents can be harmful or fatal.

reviews.headline: All Day Hold
reviews.comments: Favorite hairspray.  A little goes a long way.

reviews.headline: Great travel size!
reviews.comments: This size is great for my gym bag and it has super hold! I'm so glad I came across it while hunting for my regular spray!

reviews.headline: Hard Head is a  Hard NO
reviews.comments: I'm in the minority here but this is terrible. Bought for bridal shower, it was important for my hair to look good. It rained but I wasn't stressed because I thought this hairspray would be great. I wore my hair wavy and sprayed it, and used a hood and umbrella. In less than an hour my hair was totally limp, all waves straightened out, and frizzy. To make it worse it was crunchy and stiff limp hair so couldn't brush it or even try to recreate any type of style. One of my worst hair days ever. This is going back so fast. Never again.

reviews.headline: Better hold than competitive products
reviews.comments: Provides stronger, more permanent hold than any other product.  They pulled the all- silver can off the market, for some reason-- now that one was THE best!

reviews.headline: A little goes a long way!
reviews.comments: I don't buy any other product. A little goes a long way without looking matte or shiny. Very natural looking. Great with humidity. Will hold throughout the day & night. Adds texture and volume for us thin/fine/straight haired girls.

reviews.headline: My favorite!
reviews.comments: This hairspray holds your style and is long lasting. My hair salon informed me this is their best selling hairspray.

reviews.headline: I love this hair spray
reviews.comments: Favorite Hairspray and has been for a long time

reviews.headline: Don't let the name of this product scare you...
reviews.comments: This stuff is great.  I have fine, thin hair that hairspray evaporates when applied.  However, this is not the case with this product.  It stays in place but not really like a "helmet head" but leaves it moveable, shiny but stays in place even on humid days.  Bought a travel size to try out... Going back for a full size!!

properties.name: Best Uses

values.label: When you know your hair has to stay in place

display_values: When you know your hair has to stay in place

faceoff_positive.comments: I am very impressed by Bed Head's Hard Head Extreme Hold Hairspray.  This is an insane product and is for anyone that wants seriously extreme, rigid, non-flexible hold.  Although I cannot even imagine my hair ever needing this sort of hold, as I prefer flexible, flowy hair, this spray is impressive nonetheless.  It smells amazing, like juicy apples, and it's possible to literally create rock-hard styles by layering this spray on itself a few times.  The hold lasts through harsh wind and even mild rain!  This is some very serious stuff if you want this kind of superhero hold!
faceoff_positive.headline: Crazy hold!

faceoff_negative.comments: I received this product complimentary from Influenster to provide an honest review. The hair spray has a great smell. Something between a fresh scent and a floral scent. The hold is good, but does leave your hair feeling crunchy. I didn't notice any sticky feeling on my skin from my hair, but my hair was also up. My main complaint is how far away from your head you need to hold the can. The spray is forceful, but the stream coming out takes a while to widen out. So if you are spraying too close to your head you get a TON of hairspray in an area instead of that side of your head. And since it's so forceful, being that close to your head causes it to almost bounce off your head and get overspray to other areas, like your ears and forehead. So yes this product works, but there's a learning curve for where to hold the can. You need to be at least 2-3 feet away from your head in my opinion.
faceoff_negative.headline: Smells great
